text: BOH obitsyaye ts sered vas shcho vvazhayete ta vedete spravedlyve zhyttya, shcho Vin zrobytʹ yim sovereigns na zemli, tomu shcho Vin dlya tsykh pered tym, yak yim, ta vstanovlyatʹ dlya nykh relihiya Vin vybrav dlya nykh, ta zaminytʹ myr ta bezpeku dlya nykh zamistʹ strakha. Vse tse tomu, shcho vony obozhnyuyutʹ Meni yedynyy; vony nikoly ne vstanovlyuyutʹ budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya Meni. Tsey khto disbelieve pislya tse yavlyayutʹ soboyu spravdi bezputnyy
